data.title: CREATIVE SPOTLIGHT VIDEO: FUBAR DIRECTOR HOLLY DALE
data.meta_description: DGC Director Holly Dale delves into her long and illustrious career, including her recent experience directing Arnold Schwarzenegger in FUBAR, which drops today on Netflix! Holly shares how she became one of the first female TV Drama Directors in Canada, her approach to episodic storytelling, and why she never wants to limit herself.
data.text:
Thea Hollatz: Hot Flash

Production Designer Thea Hollatz on directing her first short film, Hot Flash which premiered at TIFF.

Scott Alexander: Mrs. America

Location Manager Scott Anderson on the locations of Mrs. America.

Matt Hannam On The Nest And Possessor

Picture Editor Matt Hannam on The Nest, Possessor and his on going relationships with Directors Sean Durkin, Josh Mond and Brandon Cronenberg.
